data.title: Gina Torres: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Gina Torres: Check out the list of all Gina Torres movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Gina Torres news on Times of India.
data.text:
Patrick J. Adams, Sarah Rafferty's upcoming 'Suits' podcast to be titled 'Sidebar: A Suits Watch Podcast'

ANI / Jun 03, 2024, 13:32 (IST)

Exciting news for 'Suits' fans: "Sidebar: A Suits Watch Podcast" will be hosted by Patrick J. Adams (Mike Ross) and Sarah Rafferty (Donna Paulsen). Produced by SiriusXM's Stitcher Studios, the podcast will feature Adams and Rafferty watching the series together for the first time and sharing behind-the-scenes stories. Special guests from the cast and crew will frequently join them. The podcast, co-created and co-hosted by Adams and Rafferty, is set to release later this year. Originally airing from 2011 to 2019, 'Suits' saw a resurgence in popularity after its release on Netflix. Adams and Rafferty expressed excitement about revisiting the show. This announcement precedes a 'Suits' cast reunion at the ATX TV Festival with Adams, Rafferty, Dule Hill, Amanda Schull, and executive producer Jeff Wachtel. Reflecting on the show's renewed popularity, Adams described it as surreal and expressed gratitude for the continued interest. The original series also starred Gabriel Macht, Meghan Markle, Rick Hoffman, and Gina Torres.

Meghan Markle's Suits co-star Gina Torres reveals why the duchess wasn't a part of their reunion, "We don't have her phone number"

etimes.in / Jan 08, 2024, 08:11 (IST)

Meghan Markle, the former star of Suits, is not part of the cast's recent group texting discussing the show's resurgence. Variety's Gina Torres mentioned this on the red carpet at the Golden Globes. However, Torres clarified that they don't have Markle's phone number. Despite that, she believes Markle will be happy for their success. Suits cast members Gabriel Macht, Sarah Rafferty, and Patrick J. Adams are set to present at the Golden Globes. The show gained new fans on Netflix this summer, coinciding with the SAG-AFTRA strike.

Jennifer Garner stuck in comic-con elevator for more than an hour, sings Madonna’s ‘Like a Prayer’

etimes.in / Jul 30, 2024, 14:30 (IST)

At the 35-minute mark, Garner sat on the elevator floor, mentioning she had heard on shows like The Office or Brooklyn Nine-Nine that sitting down was a good idea in such situations. As the wait continued, she passed the time by singing “99 Bottles of Beer” at the 41-minute mark and informed viewers that they had called 911 for help at 45 minutes.

Suits Season 9: Plot details, release date and all you need to know

etimes.in / Jun 03, 2024, 10:06 (IST)

After a long wait, 'Suits' enthusiasts rejoice as the final season, Season 9, is set to hit OTT platforms. The legal drama, renowned for its captivating characters like Harvey Specter and Mike Ross, will return to Netflix on July 1, as confirmed during the ATX TV Festival in Austin, Texas. With 10 episodes, this season promises to delve into the personal and professional dilemmas of its beloved characters. Additionally, a spinoff titled 'Suits: L.A.' is in the works, offering a fresh narrative within the same universe.

NBC orders pilot for 'Suits: LA' spinoff

etimes.in / Feb 02, 2024, 13:51 (IST)

The new series will focus on Ted Black, a former federal prosecutor from New York who has transitioned into representing powerful clients in Los Angeles. Ted's firm faces a crisis, and to survive, he must take on a role he previously disdained. Surrounded by a dynamic group of characters, Ted navigates the complexities of his personal and professional life while confronting events from his past that led him to leave everything behind

Patrick J. Adams believed he had closed the 'History Book' on Suits

etimes.in / Jan 09, 2024, 06:24 (IST)

Patrick J. Adams reflects on the unexpected return of Suits at the 2024 Golden Globes, mentioning the show's revival on Netflix and its continuous success. Adams describes the "second swell" of popularity and expresses gratitude for the show's enduring appeal. The Suits reunion at the Golden Globes included Adams, Gabriel Macht, Sarah Rafferty, and Gina Torres, while Meghan Markle, who left the show after season 7, also expressed her joy at the revival. Take a look at what Patrick had to share:

Jennifer Garner sings Madonna's 'Like a prayer' while being stuck in elevator

ANI / Jul 31, 2024, 00:31 (IST)

Jennifer Garner's debut at San Diego Comic-Con took an unexpected turn when she was trapped in a hotel elevator for over an hour. At the event to promote her return as Elektra in Deadpool and Wolverine, Garner's day became a memorable adventure when the elevator at the Hard Rock Hotel in San Diego malfunctioned. Garner documented the experience on Instagram, sharing videos of the unfolding drama. She kept the mood light with humorous commentary, joking about the situation and referencing popular TV shows like The Office and Brooklyn Nine-Nine. As time went on, she sang songs to keep spirits up, including "99 Bottles of Beer" and Madonna's "Like a Prayer."

Popular TV show Suits returns with a new season with the original creator

etimes.in / Oct 15, 2023, 10:52 (IST)

The popular TV show Suits is planning a comeback with a spinoff series. Creator Aaron Korsh is working on a new Suits universe series for NBCUniversal, with new characters in a new location, potentially set in Los Angeles. The spinoff is not a revival or reboot, but a standalone series. The network or platform for the new series has yet to be established. Suits gained popularity, possibly due to curiosity about Meghan Markle's final role before becoming a royal.

From Meghan Markle turning the Duchess of Sussex to Kathrine Heigl winning hearts with Firefly Lane; A look at what the Suits cast is doing now

etimes.in / Nov 22, 2023, 22:26 (IST)

The popular legal drama series "Suits," known for featuring Meghan Markle before she became the Duchess of Sussex, is now available on Netflix. The show follows the story of Mike Ross, a brilliant college dropout who becomes a lawyer despite never attending law school. Although the series ended in 2019, fans are still hoping for a reboot. The cast of "Suits" will reunite at the ATX TV Festival in July 2024. Meghan Markle has since married Prince Harry and founded her non-profit company Archewell. Other cast members have also continued their acting careers.
